title: The new LIV Alight Disc range gets updated frame design, more tire clearance up front
content:
Not to be confused with the latest trend of flat bar gravel bikes, fitness hybrids are alive and well. These bikes offer a sporty, but more upright riding position perfectly suited to bike path journeys or quick spins around town.
